subject: [LH] Re: Long and Winding Road
body:
Spie, 
The only time/place I ever heard KB
singThe Long and Winding Road was recently on the video on YouTube.  
My guess is somebody at that radio station discovered it there also.

>> I heard Kate singing The Long and
Winding Road in a salon in Mudletta
>> Georgia. It was part of an 80's/90's alternative satellite station.

>That's pretty strange, as that's only available as an obscure, grainy
>bootleg.  Or was that one of the tracks that appeared officially
on a
>semi-official Japanese fan-club flexidisk?  I wonder how they
would have
>gotten hold of one of those.
.
Regards,
Neal Mulvenna
IBM Software Services for WebSphere
